column6: Must vehicles of this type finally return to their respective starting depots?

column8: Assuming 10 Compartments are available with each Compartment being 3 times that of an NDRF Bus

The AC could be almost static at TP6; and it itself has the VD5 hosted with rescue speed boats. It will send boats for a recuse mission in the Andamans. The Boats return to the AC after the operation.
